Modified Werewolf 13er


Shamelessly stolen from Natirasha, with several edits from yours truly.

    0) Obey all site rules.

Gamestate
    1) Days are 14 days long, and nights are 48 hours long. I reserve the right to change this for whatever reason. Rest assured that if this actually happens, it's your fault.
    2) VOTE: Shinobi, Vote Shinobi, or Vote: Shinobi are the only acceptable forms of voting. I will not count any attempts to vote that are not in one of those formats. Unvotes are not required.
    3) No trick voting. If you try to game the system/trick other players into voting/quickhammering by purposefully voting incorrectly, you will be modkilled if the game doesn't end on its own.
    4) A lynch is achieved when half of the living players, rounded down plus one have voted for a player. Once that event has happened, all votes are locked and twilight ensues.
    5) Once you're dead, you're dead. Please do not post anymore. If you were replaced out for whatever reason, please do not post in thread.
    6) If a majority is not reached at the end of the day, a no-lynch will be achieved. You have been warned.
    7) All night actions will be covered in your role pms. If you have questions in regards to your role, do not hesitate to ask me in private and I will resolve it ASAP.
    8) I will attempt to keep track of the deadline as often as I can. I will attempt to post the time in every votecount I give you. If I forget to do so or I decide not to for whatever reason, it is your responsibility to keep track.

Activity/Mod Actions
    1) I will prod a player after fourty-eight hours without posting. If a player accumulates three prods during a day or fails to respond to a prod in 72 hours, I will replace that player. Lurking is an acceptable tactic; it is up to the town to put a stop to it. If I get the feeling that you're simply not playing or are prod-dodging to waste a slot, I reserve the right to force-replace you.
    2) Prods will only be handed out starting 2 days from day start. If I feel you haven't responded to prods given earlier in a satisfactory way, I reserve the right to force replace you.
    3) If you need to go on V/LA for whatever reason, post in the thread in bold text. State the length of your V/LA; otherwise, it will be assumed that you will only be gone for 24 hours.
    4) You may not discuss the game outside this thread with other players involved in the game unless you are in cahoots with them (IE: scumteams, masons, etc). You may have a 'rant buddy' who is outside the game, but I wish to be informed of their identity for replacement purposes. Don't abuse this. If you decide to chat outside of the game, please keep track of the transcripts.
    5) I am not responsible for your mistakes. If you screw up a tag or something, I will not edit it for you. If you have the ability to edit posts, please do not do so. I will not edit your posts for you.
    6) Avatars, titles, signatures, and your location are out-of-game areas.
    7) Please do not quote out-of-thread communications. Modkilling is something that I would prefer to avoid. Do not tempt my wrath.
    8) Although somewhat divine, I am prone to mistakes. If I miss anything, please PM me and I will resolve the issue as best as possible.
    9) I reserve the right to remove you if I feel you have crossed a behavioral line. If I do so, rest assured that you have shit the bed in a manner most foul.
    10) I reserve the right to change the rules at my own discretion. I will notify the thread if/when I do so.
    11) Don't make encrypted posts and don't try to pull the wool over my eyes. If I get the feeling that you're screwing with the rules or are playfully breaking them, you will be modkilled.

Important Note
    1) Bold green is my color. Do not tempt my wrath by using it. I'm watching you, town.

There are 8 villagers, 3 werewolves, a Seer and a N1 Angel:
Spoiler: Roles
Role PM
Villager

You are a part of the village. You have the power of your voice and your vote. Help your fellow villagers find and eliminate the werewolves.

Win Condition (Village): You win when all Werewolves have been removed from play.


Role PM
Seer

You are a part of the village. Every night, you may peek a player to determine their alignment.

Find and eliminate the werewolves.

Win Condition (Village): You win when all Werewolves have been removed from play.


Role PM
Night 1 Angel

You are a part of the village. On Night 1, you will protect one player from a night kill. This action is compulsive. If you don't take an action, the mod will RNG your action for you.

Find and eliminate the werewolves.

Win Condition (Village): You win when all Werewolves have been removed from play.


Role PM
Werewolf

You are a werewolf. You have a factional kill that you may use every night. Your teammates are X and Y. Your werewolf QT is here. Blend in with the villagers to survive.

Win Condition (Werewolf): You win when all villagers are dead or nothing can stop that from happening.

Player List:
  1. Doctor Who WoodyWoodpecker
  2. Keyser Söze
  3. Bulbazoor
  4. TonyMontana

    Doctor Who
    BlueBloodedToffee
    Dierfire
    Boonskiies


Dead
Spoiler:
    Banakai, the Werewolf was lynched Day 1.
    Haschel Cedricson, the Villager was devoured Night 1.
    Zoronos, the Villager was lynched Day 2.
    Kmd4390, the Villager was devoured Night 2.
    absta101, the Villager was lynched Day 3.
    RedCoyote, the Seer was devoured Night 3.
    Bulbazoor, the Werewolf was lynched Day 4.
    TonyMontana, the Night 1 Angel was devoured Night 4.
    Keyser Söze, the Villager was lynched Day 5.


Modkilled
Spoiler:
Nobody. Keep it that way.

Role PMs are going out shortly. Game will start when 10/13 players confirm. Confirmed players will be bolded in the playerlist. Unconfirmed players have 24 hours to confirm/post or will be prodded.

Confirm by responding to your role PM.

Dawn

Fog descended over the village, signaling the approach of evil as the villagers were well aware. They began to look amongst themselves for some sort of sign that one of them was taken by the coming corruption. What were they looking for, exactly? Probably a pack of hooligans looking to make some coin, or perhaps they were dealing with something more...Sinister.

Day 1 ends on August 7, at 1:30 PM. With 13 alive, it takes 7 to lynch. Good luck.

Jesus Christ this thread just keeps on going, doesn't it? Anyhoo, I'm pretty sure my brain glazed over sometime in the last page or two but I do have a couple opinions to bring to the table.

First off, my number one scumread right now is Banakai. There have been a few really weird statements, and they started with his first post:
[quote=Banakai]Woody: would you care to explain why you are playing so defensive? As a town usually you just have to accept that one of you are gonna die day 1 probbably, and just try and get as much information as possible even when being voted.[...]

BBT: Do you think there would be any motivation in this game for a scum to tunnel on Woody like you are now?[/quote]
The first sentence is oddly fatalistic; if somebody is attack you with crappy arguments (like I believe Keyser and BBT were), it is a disservice to the town to NOT be defensive. And what is up with that second question to BBT? It comes across almost like an attempt to bolster a scumbuddy's town cred. Later on I feel he completely misrepresents WW's statement about "not needing to scumhunt within the first hours of the game" and conflates activity with scumhunting, which are obviously not the same. He then goes on to read redFF as town, but then wavers saying that he posted "some questionable things". The problem is, I don't think any of the things he cites are questionable at all; heck, banakai makes the EXACT SAME JOKE he describes as "forced" in post 305. This gives the feeling of somebody trying to set up a reason to later vote for a person they once publicly stated was town. In fact, this is indeed exactly what he does in 317. Also in post 305 he says "The werewolf is probbably not posted enough comments to get noticed by me". Anybody see anything weird about that? Like the attitude that we're only looking for one person and not a partnership?

Now he votes for Boonskiies, citing a reason that does not apply at all, since Boonskiies did not replace Woody. However, even after admitting this, he keeps his vote there! This would be fine, except he doesn't mention any other reasons! Then instead of giving reasons he claims he was going to post them but "[boon] just made a case for himself." Really? An event that happened AFTER your vote can't be your reason for making the vote in the first place; why didn't you post the case you said you already wrote anyways? Is it because you never wrote up a case at all? (I think it's because you never wrote up a case at all.)

There's probably some more stuff but damned if I'm wading through 20 pages to find it again. Nevertheless, Vote: Banakai

As for notes on the others: I mentioned earlier that Keyser and BBT were both making a really awful case against WW and then had even more awful reactions to people pointing that out. Keyser gives me a sense of sincerity, even though I disagree with a lot of what he says. He did commit my personal pet peeve of answering a question that was targeted to another player, but everything else about him seems fairly genuine for now.

BBT does not give me that impression. His first attack on Woody was disbelief of Woody's claim that he missed the Haschelwagon. I think this was silly, but then BBT doubles down and starts strawmanning. His reaction to redFF's reaction to Woody's claim doesn't seem right to me; there is nothing about redFF's post that comes off as "super fake" to me. What DOES come across as fake, though, is his suspicion of absta. Absta asked for elaboration on the crappy WW case, because elaboration was 100% needed. He also sets up a false dichotomy:
BBT wrote:He goes against me; saying he disagrees with my reasoning and it feels forced. This would imply he thinks I'm scum, no?"
What? No, it doesn't imply that at all. Why would you say it did?

By the by, I find it very hard to believe that he somehow didn't check Woody's join date until post 244.

Right. Moving on.

Bulb is giving a ton of posts that just sort of state what happened, with not a lot of analysis. I also didn't like him stating that "Absta is ww or town." Is there a Scummie for Least Hard-Hitting Analysis? If so, that sentence deserves it. I also don't like his attitude of "We can't keep WW til Lylo; may as well get rid of him now." Other than that, though, what analysis IS there doesn't raise any red flags for me.

redFF is the towniest townie that ever towned a town. Kmd is raising good points; slight townread there. The RC situation baffles me a little; his intro post wasn't the best ever, but I agreed with a lot of parts of it and certainly don't think it merits three votes on its own after so many things have happened in the intervening time. Sure, he's lurking, but so was I. So was TonyMontana. So activity can't account for all of it.

I like Boonskiies post 327 and wish there was some followup there. I do not like his 329 and would like an explanation. Then again I really like his self-vote, so you're alright in my book, Boonskiies.

Absta is a minor scum read due to his statement that Keyser was town near the beginning accompanied by some hedging. I agree with his point about BBT's attacks on Woody being forced, but I disagree with his belief that Woody is scummy for "defending instead of finding scum". I also don't like his reaction to Boonskiies earlier.

I don't have anything specific to say about Zoronos but I found myself agreeing with a lot of the arguments he was posting.

That's it for now.
